title: Coach LFT
body: I am looking for players to form a team, or a team that is already formed looking for a coach. My main reasoning to the "coach" role is because i know what needs to be done to win a game but I dont have the mechanical skills to pull it off, i am smart with mid game rotations and objective control. Please let me know if you are interested in game at Perd. Thanks!

replies.body: Gold V player with a team of IRL friends ranging from bronze IV to Silver II, if your interested in helping the lower guys talk to me and I'll see what you know

Mechanics dont really matter when it comes to soloq, its more using knowledge to get objectives and carry games, so being Bronze 2 is way to low to coach a high level team, im not hating, just saying proffesh coaches are usually mid diamond to low master
Yeah im not expecting to be put on anything higher that silver 1 hah i just want to see how i go too :)
